caption:
🐉📚 LESSON 5: LAUNCHING WITH HARDLY ANY BUDGET 🐉📚
Starting a physical goods business is not a cheap nor easy endeavor — so we had to get scrappy about launching Omsom! (Which, tbh, we’re no strangers to as the daughters of refugees 😋)

Lesson is: constraints can inspire creativity! A bit of heart + hustle can go a long way as small business owners 💪🏽

🐉📚🐉📚🐉📚🐉📚
2024 is the Year of the Dragon – the creature embodying leadership + ambition in the Chinese Zodiac 🐉

But as a proud + loud food brand, we see leaders as those who not only show strength, but also vulnerability + humility in their journey. To celebrate the Wood Dragon, we’re giving you a brutally honest, step-by-step look into how Omsom was born 👀 Welcome to Lessons of the Dragon!
